data.name: to help as many people as I can.
data.value: 帮助尽可能多的人们

data.name: DONATE WITH CREDIT OR DEBIT CARD NOW
data.value: 立即用信用卡捐款

data.name: An amount of your choice to help as many people as you can.
data.value: 我自己选择的余额尽可能多地帮助他们。

data.name: gift of:
data.value: 捐款：

data.name: I would like to make a
data.value: 我想

data.name: DONATE NOW USING WECHAT OR ALIPAY
data.value: 立即用微信或支付宝捐款

data.name: Or scan the QR code below with your Alipay app to donate now:
data.value: 或者用支付宝扫描下面的二维码：

data.name: Donate
data.value: 捐款

data.name: To make a donation with Alipay, please select 'Open with Browser' from the context menu (three dots) at the top of your screen.
data.value: 为了使用支付宝进行捐款，请点击右上角菜单按钮（三个点）选择“在浏览器打开”。

data.name: To make a donation with Alipay, please select 'Open in Safari' from the context menu (three dots) at the top of your screen.
data.value: 为了使用支付宝进行捐款，请点击右上角菜单按钮（三个点）选择“在Safari打开”。

data.name: monthly
data.value: 每月

data.name: one time
data.value: 一次

data.name: quarterly
data.value: 每季

data.name: yearly
data.value: 每年

data.name: Amount is required.
data.value: 金额是必需的。

data.name: Please enter a valid amount.
data.value: 请输入一个有效的金额。

data.name: My urgent gift for cold weather support
data.value: 我为严寒天气提供的紧急捐款

data.name: When the weather is cold, more people come to us and they all need urgent help.
data.value: 寒冷的季节里，更多的人来到这里，寻求紧急的救助。

data.name: I want my gift to repeat automatically every month.
data.value: 我愿意每个月自动捐出同样的数额。

data.name: I would like to make a gift of:
data.value: 我想捐款：

data.name: Every hot meal we serve at the Renewal Center relies on a supporter gift of 15 RMB. And your gift of 60 RMB could provide a meal, plus one day of accommodation on our incredibly effective job training program.
data.value: 我们在日新中心提供的每顿热腾腾的餐食都需要15元人民币的捐赠。若您捐赠60元，就可以为人们提供一顿热饭，外加参与一天卓有成效的就业培训项目及寄宿费用。

data.name: to help as many people as I can.
data.value: 帮助尽量多的人。

data.name: An amount of my choice to help as many people as I can.
data.value: 尽我所能帮助尽量多的人。

data.name: Give urgent meals and support now
data.value: 立刻提供急需的食物和其他帮助

data.name: to provide meals and support for 8 people
data.value: 为8人提供饭菜和其它帮助

data.name: to provide meals and support for 14 people
data.value: 为14人提供饭菜和其它帮助

data.name: to provide meals and support for 25 people
data.value: 为25人提供饭菜和其它帮助

data.name: to provide meals and support for 35 people
data.value: 为35人提供饭菜和其它帮助

data.name: to provide meals and emergency care for 8 people
data.value: 提供8人份的餐食、淋浴和干净衣物

data.name: to provide meals and emergency care for 14 people
data.value: 提供14人份的餐食、淋浴和干净衣物

data.name: to provide meals and emergency care for 25 people
data.value: 提供25人份的餐食、淋浴和干净衣物

data.name: to provide meals and emergency care for 35 people
data.value: 提35人份的餐食、淋浴和干净衣物

data.name: The meals you provide bring joy and relief.
data.value: 您捐赠的食物为人们带去欢乐和安慰

data.name: For hungry people who are stuck outside, your kind support may be the only help they will receive. The meals you provide will help them survive – but you’re also helping us bring friendship and urgent support when we see people with more serious needs.
data.value: 对于那些目前流落在外、饥肠辘辘的人们来说，您的慷慨解囊可能是他们唯一的希望。您捐赠的那些食物将帮助他们生存下去，并让他们感受到友谊。同时，对那些情况更严重的人来说，您也将为他们提供更多急需的帮助。
